reference_summary:
Way We Were, The
Drama, Passionate, Sad, Sentimental
['Set during the politically charged time of pre-WWII McCarthyism, a young couple with diametrically opposing views of politics, friendships and careers find it difficult to balance their private love and desires with their very public lives.']
{'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Pollack', 'Sydney'], 'Producers': ['Ray Stark'], 'Starring': ['Barbra Streisand', 'Robert Redford', 'Bradford Dillman']}
Most movies have happy endings. The ending is not horible but its not a good one. I wish the main character would had fought for his wife, specialy because it is because of her that he got to the top! Never even notice him being depress or ask for a second opportunity or do anything to save the marriage. It broke my heart!
Upset! No happy ending to an amazong movie!
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Radha Bharadwaj'], 'Producers': ['Radha Bharadwaj', 'Gregory Cascante', 'Mike Cline', 'Christian Slater'], 'Starring': ['Jared Leto', 'Christian Slater', 'Claire Forlani'], 'Studio': ['Multicom Entertainment Group (MEG)']}
The only reason why i gave this movie a 4 n not a  5 star is because basil didnt mary clara at the end.
Amazing movie.
The Song
Drama, Romance, Inspiring, Mystical
['An aspiring singer-songwriter is struggling to catch a break and escape the long shadow of his famous father until he writes a love song that catapults him to stardom.']
{'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Richard Ramsey'], 'Producers': ['Shane Sooter', 'Cassandra Pelan'], 'Starring': ['Ali Faulkner', 'Alan Powell', 'Caitlin Nicol-Thomas']}
I love the lessons this movie teaches! Most humans are just worried about providing, they forget to protect the most important things Love (God) and family!!!!!!
Sooo worth it!

Its ok

Comedy, Arthouse, Romance, International
['Nineteen year old Oli falls for her TV idol and embarks on a Cinderella-like romance filled with luxury, fame, success and money. It seems she has found her fairy tale ending, until she learns good chemistry and true love are not one and the same.']

Unbroken: Path to Redemption
Drama, Compelling, Emotional, Tense
["Beginning where the hit movie Unbroken concludes, the next chapter brings the rest of Louis Zamperini's inspirational true story to life."]
{'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Harold Cronk'], 'Producers': ['Matthew Baer', 'Mike Elliott'], 'Starring': ['Samuel Hunt', 'Merritt Patterson', 'Vincenzo Amato']}
This movie is amazing! Dude to diferent kind of child hood abuses  n having a big trigger as an adult I also had ptsd! Once I started to hear preachers on how important it is to be fill with Gods spirit, and to renew my mind my focusing on him not on my pain , so i started to focus on  Jesus and Jesus heal me! I used to go all around college crying.  Many people use to stop me and ask me what was wrong. I used to lied and said I had a bad case of sinuses! NOw i go around college, telling people my testimony and a healing Christian program call celebrate recovery!  this is a must watch story!
WOW!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user maintains a strong preference for emotional and dramatic narratives that delve into complex relationships and societal issues, particularly in historical contexts. Their recent interactions indicate a developing inclination towards uplifting storytelling, emphasizing themes of personal healing, redemption, and spirituality. They have previously expressed appreciation for narratives that convey hope and community support.

However, the latest interaction reveals a critical approach to storytelling, as the user expressed disappointment with a film that failed to meet their expectations for engaging plots and left them with an unsatisfactory feeling. This review, rated low, underscores the user's discerning taste; while they resonate with comfort-driven stories, they also demand depth and quality from their entertainment.

Overall, their profile reflects a multifaceted perspective, seeking narratives that stimulate both the mind and heart. The user values impactful storytelling that balances emotionally charged dramas with lighter, uplifting tales, yet holds a firm standard for engaging content. Their preferences suggest a complex appreciation for stories that not only provide comfort but also provoke critical reflection, emphasizing the need for a meaningful connection with the narratives they consume.
